question.prompt: What is the principal (chief) question or concern you have regarding your current condition?
In your own words, please provide a brief narrative of the details of the problem for which you are requesting a second opinion:
Have you ever been pregnant?
If you have ever been pregnant, please provide additional information below:

table_data.cell: Number of times you have been pregnant
Number of miscarriages you have had, if any
Number of elective abortions you have undergone
Number of ectopic pregnancies (outside the uterus) you have had
Number of premature (born early) babies you have had
Number of babies born at full term (when expected)

question.prompt: Did any of the babies have congenital heart deformities?
If any of the babies had congenital heart deformities, please provide details:
Did any of the babies die at birth?
If any of the babies died at birth, please provide details:
Did any of the babies require treatment at birth?
If any of the babies required treatment at birth, please provide details:
What is your occupation?
For how long have you been actively trying to get pregnant? Enter the number of months:
For how long have you and your partner been together? Enter the number of years or months:
How long has it been since you have tried to prevent pregnancy? Enter the number of months:
Do you exercise regularly?
If you exercise regularly, please list the type of exercise (i.e.: jogging, step machine, aerobics, etc.)
How many sessions per week?
How long per session?
Have you ever been diagnosed with intravascular (in vein or artery) blood clots?
Have you been exposed to any toxic substances at work?
Have you ever undergone chemotherapy?
If you have ever undergone chemotherapy, please provide the following information:

column_definition.label:
Condition for which
it was administrated

question.prompt: Have you ever undergone radiation treatments?
If you have ever undergone radiation treatments, please provide the following information:

column_definition.label:
Condition for which
it was used

question.prompt: What is the average length of your menstrual cycle (from the first day of a period to the first day of the next period) ?
If abnormal, please choose the most appropriate response:
If abnormal, how long has it been this way?
If more recently, how long?
Which of the following best describes your average menstrual flow?
How long has your menstrual flow been this way?
If more recently, how long?
Do you experience any pain with your period?
If you experience any pain with your period, please rate your menstrual pain below: (1 = minimal pain, 10 = worst pain)
When did your pain start?
If more recently, how long?
Do you ever experience pain in the middle of your cycle (approximately 2 weeks after your period) ?
If you ever experience pain in the middle of your cycle, please rate your mid-cycle pain below: (1 = minimal pain, 10 = worst pain)
How long does the pain last? (days)
Do you experience pain any other days during your cycle?
If you experience pain any other days during your cycle, please rate your pain below: (1 = minimal pain, 10 = worst pain)
How long does the pain last? (days)
Do you ever experience dyspareunia (pain with sexual intercourse)?
When was your last pap smear test?
What was the result of your last pap test, if known?
Have you ever had abnormal results?
If you have ever had abnormal results, please indicate the date(s):

If you have or have you had HPV, please provide the date(s):

If other, please list:

If you have, have had Chlamydia, please provide the date(s):

If your partner is the person providing the sperm, please answer the following questions. If you are using a sperm donor, please provide as much information as possible.

How old is your partner?
How many pregnancies have you had with this partner?
How many children have you had with this partner?
Did your partner have children with a previous partner?
If your partner had children with a previous partner, please provide the following information:
Does your partner drink alcohol?
If your partner drinks alcohol, how many servings per week?
Does your partner take recreational drugs?
If your partner takes recreational drugs, which drugs?
Does your partner smoke?
If your partner smokes, how many packs per day?
How many years has your partner been smoking?
In general, what is the condition of your partner's health?
Does your partner take any medications?

If your partner takes any medications, please list the names of the medications below. Please be sure to include all prescription medications and non-prescription medications including herbal remedies and vitamin supplements:
Please provide information about your partner's allergies below:
Has your partner ever been exposed to excessive heat?
Please list all surgeries your partner has undergone
Does your partner have any medical problems?
If your partner has any medical problems, please list:
What is your partner's occupation?
Has your partner been exposed to any toxic substances at work?
